Text: Receive full credit towards a Masters degree from your CFP coursesPST marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif Important Information for CFP Program Students Considering a Masters Degree As you may know the CFP Professional Education Program is also the foundation for the Master of Science Degree in the Financial Planning Specialization from the College for Financial Planning The courses CFP through CFP receive masterslevel credit when you enroll in the masters program for a total of of the required credit hours This accreditation is about to change Now is the time to enroll in the Colleges masters program to receive full credit for all of your CFP courses You must enroll in the program before December in order for all of your credits to be transferable Keep in mind that the enrollment process can take a few weeks so dont wait until the last minute Even if you are just beginning your CFP course work you may still enroll in the masters program and receive full credit for all courses but you must enroll prior to the deadline To enroll in the masters program or for more information call an Enrollment Advisor at option or visit the Colleges Web site adclickaspciid CFP CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER and CFP with flame logo are certification marks owned by the Certified Financial Planner Board of Standards Inc The College for Financial Planning does not certify individuals to use the CFP CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER or CFP with flame logo certification marks CFP certification is granted only by the Certified Financial Planner Board of Standards to those persons who in addition to completing an education requirement such as this CFP BoardRegistered Program have met its ethics experience and examination requirements You have been sent this message because you are a current or former student of the College for Financial Planning If you wish to manage the kind of information the College for Financial Planning sends you via email please click on the following link SubscriptionManagementaspemailpplatteectEenronEcom

New Course OfferingPST marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif marketinfographicsMockupagif adclickaspciid The College is pleased to announce the availability of a new course Certification in LongTerm Care This eightsession course gives you the information you need to address and plan for the longterm needs of your clients The course can be completed in hours of selfstudy or in three days of onsite classroom instruction for large groups of students Click here for more information adclickaspciid or call the Student Services Center at option to sign up for the course or if you have additional questions You have been sent this message because you are a current or former student of the College for Financial Planning If you wish to manage the kind of information the College for Financial Planning sends you via email please click on the following link SubscriptionManagementaspemailpplatteectEenronEcom
